sentence.Network_en: On this state, it is be able to move reversely yet ( electric interlock ).
sentence.Network_cn: 在这种分闸状态下, 反向移动也行 ( 机械联锁 ).

sentence.Network_en: Reversely, an older ( ~ 10~6 yr ) CSS can have a high temperature.
sentence.Network_cn: 相反的, 在一定的条件下即使在较年老 ( ～10~6yr ) 的时候,它仍能保持相当高的温度.

sentence.Network_en: Instead, the motor rotate reversely , push rod ( rod ) push out, the valve plate closes, stops discharging.
sentence.Network_cn: 反之, 电机反转, 推杆 ( 活塞杆 ) 推出, 阀板关闭, 停止卸料.
